So for example, when the riots were taking place in Greece or during the attacks in Mumbai, occasionally you would see stories circulating on the Internet, or even on air, that weren't necessarily true, but because it was happening so fast it was hard to keep up with it.

Did you see this yourself?
Did you get this from a news source?
